thread.title: Great modern hotel, close to the Eiffel Tower.
thread.title_full: Great modern hotel, close to the Eiffel Tower. - Review of First Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: georginavictoria
title: Great modern hotel, close to the Eiffel Tower.
text:
Great hotel! Room was comfortable, modern with amazing views of the Eiffel Tower. Staff spoke great English and very polite. Shops were close by with great restaurants within minutes walk. The Eiffel Tower was a 10 minute walk.
Would definitely recommend this hotel!
